description: Design of a chemical process based on recent advances in chemical engineering technology. Weekly design meetings with faculty advisor and industrial consultants. Comprehensive design report and formal oral presentation.
name: PROCESS SYS DESIGN PROJ

values.comments:
This course is the senior design capstone of the CBE major, involving design of a chemical process based on recent advances in chemical engineering technology and weekly design meetings with faculty advisor and industrial consultants, resulting in a comprehensive design report and formal oral presentation.

Some students found the course to be a “unifying experience,” but many students also felt that the course “is falling short of its potential.”

Students felt that “some consultants really made a contribution,” and the course could be improved by allowing students to “choose the project they worked on.”

Students overall found the course to be “challenging,” and the workload “better suited for a 2 semester schedule.”
